author: lgo
msg: Migrate the first SSL tunnel test to the new test framework.
(test_setup_ssltunnel): Rewrite using mock server/proxy and macro's.

author: lgo
msg: Add OpenSSL error logging at every location where serf returns error
(ssl_decrypt, ssl_encrypt): Add logging in case of I/O error.

author: lgo
msg: Add some minimum tests for Negotiate authentication. These tests don't test the
full handshake, but merely verify that serf doesn't hang or crash in the initial
handshake steps (see issue #119 for a example of what this test will catch).

author: lgo
msg: Follow up to r2282: keep the fix for the Negotiate proxy, but now without
making serf crash when connecting to a Negotiate server.
(serf__setup_request_spnego_auth): Use peer to check for host or proxy, not
http code (yes this is very confusing).
